宴客.definition: to host a banquet; guest at a banquet

宴會.definition: banquet; feast; dinner party; CL:席[xi2],個|个[ge4]

宴樂.definition: peace and happiness; feasting; making merry

宴請.definition: to entertain (for dinner); to invite to dinner

宴飲.definition: to wine and dine; to feast; banquet

宴饗.definition: to host a banquet; feast; banquet; ceremony of sacrifice
